Entry Phase expires when postseason games begin
Postseason Phase expires when the postseason ends

PRE-ENTRY PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in PRE-ENTRY phase
custom_expected: THEN the bracket is empty and a user cannot enter picks

title: ENTRY PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in ENTRY phase
custom_expected: THEN the user can edit, save and submit picks

title: POSTSEASON PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in POSTSEASON phase
custom_expected: THEN the bracket is locked from editing and user can view the bracket

title: POST-POSTSEASON PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in POST-POSTSEASON phase
custom_expected: THEN the bracket is scored and the user can view the bracket

title: PRE-ENTRY PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in PRE-ENTRY phase
custom_expected: THEN no users are listed on the leaderboard

title: ENTRY PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in ENTRY phase
custom_expected: THEN no users are listed on the leaderboard

title: POSTSEASON PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in POSTSEASON phase
custom_expected: THEN the leaderboard is updated as games are scored

title: POST-POSTSEASON PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in POST-POSTSEASON phase
custom_expected: THEN the latest leaderboard results are displayed

title: PRE-ENTRY PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in PRE-ENTRY phase
custom_expected: THEN users can create, edit and share groups

title: ENTRY PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in ENTRY phase
custom_expected: THEN users can create, edit and share groups

title: POSTSEASON PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in POSTSEASON phase
custom_expected: THEN groups are locked from creating/editing and users can view existing groups

title: POST-POSTSEASON PHASE
custom_preconds: GIVEN challenge is in POST-POSTSEASON phase
custom_expected: THEN users can view existing groups
